ai-thag2.36:1.1_0: “For whose mind is like a rock,
ai-thag2.36:1.3_0: free of desire for desirable things,
ai-thag2.36:1.4_0: not getting annoyed when things are annoying?
ai-thag2.36:1.5_0: from where will suffering strike one
ai-thag2.36:1.6_0: whose mind is developed like this?
ai-thag2.36:2.1_0: My mind is like a rock,
ai-thag2.36:2.3_0: free of desire for desirable things,
ai-thag2.36:2.4_0: not getting annoyed when things are annoying?
ai-thag2.36:2.5_0: From where will suffering strike me
ai-thag2.36:2.6_0: whose mind is developed like this?
ai-thag2.36:2.7_0: the senior monk who lay down,
